translationtableentry.result: In Egypt the splendor of the age of the pharaohs is now only a memory.\nRome keeps king Ptolemy XII in government and demands unjust tributes to the Egyptian people.\nDiscontent increases and revolt breaks out: Egypt clashes with Rome...
